notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Perry E. Sheffield, Simone A. M. Uijttewaal, and Maida P. Galvez conceived of the idea; Simone A. M. Uijttewaal performed the searches and data comparison; Perry E. Sheffield, Simone A. M. Uijttewaal, and James Stewart evaluated the data; all authors wrote and reviewed the paper.
